successes.title: Exclusive Numenera Boxed Set Edition from Monte Cook Games
successes.description: The award-winning Numenera RPG from Monte Cook presented in an exclusive, deluxe boxed format with loads of incredible extras.

Pledges.description: JUST THE BOX. BOX ONLY. You get a beautiful, sturdy box to put your Numenera products in.

THE STRONGBOX. You get a boxed set edition of Numenera, including all the booklets, the poster map, six character sheets, and the character creation handout. We'll list you as a supporter of this project if you so choose (see the FAQ).

THE RELIQUARY. You get a boxed set edition of Numenera, including all the booklets, the poster map, 25 character sheets, the character creation handout, an XP card deck, an art print signed and numbered by Monte Cook and Shanna Germain, a cloth version of the poster map, and anything added to the campaign thanks to stretch goals. We'll list you as a supporter of this project if you so choose (see the FAQ).

RETAILER STRONGBOXES. You get six boxed set editions of Numenera, including all the booklets, the poster map, the character sheet, and the character creation handout, as described in the STRONGBOX level. This level is for verified retailers only.

NUMENERA SUPERFAN. You get all the benefits of THE RELIQUARY backer level. You also get a subscription to every other product Monte Cook Games releases (print and pdf), from the end of this Kickstarter campaign through 31 December, 2015.

NUMENERA SUPERFAN. You get all the benefits of THE RELIQUARY backer level. You also get a subscription to every other Numenera product Monte Cook Games releases (print and pdf), from the end of this Kickstarter campaign through 31 December, 2015.
